channel.title: Hugo on Robert Myles McDonnell
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Robert Myles McDonnell

item.title: How to make a GitHub pages blog with RStudio and Hugo
item.description: Update: for some people who may have some issues setting up the blog the way I’ve set out here, see Kate’s helpful comments below. Since April or so of last year, I’ve had a personal website on GitHub pages, where I keep this blog and a few other things. Setting it up was at times frustrating, but a good learning process (I especially picked up a lot of Git through that experience).
